title: Looking for players to play ranked 5's! All Divisions are WELCOME
body: So me and my friend RigourX came up with a team called XRated Gaming, we need people who are willing to change their summoner name to add a simple capital X at the end of their name. For example, LyonX: RigourX. You can DM me on instagram: LoLLyonx, Twitter: LoLXainco or add me on league, IGN: LyonX

replies.body: Depends on the roles you need, I could join I suppose, and half the time I use the X on the end of my name anyways.....what roles you looking for?
I'd love to join a team but there's no way in hell I'm paying 1300 RP or 13900 IP for a name change just to join a team that may crumble after a few weeks.
im a bronze 3 pro what are you?
